mint(address,uint256,address,uint256,byt.details: An empty proof is supplied when no proof is required.

params.paymentToken: ERC20 token address to accept payment in. address(0) indicates ETH.

params.cost: The amount of payment tokens to accept for each token minted.
params.endTime: The end time of the sale. Tokens cannot be minted after this time.
params.merkleRoot: The merkle root for allowlist minting.
params.paymentToken: The ERC20 token address to accept payment in. address(0) indicates ETH.
params.startTime: The start time of the sale. Tokens cannot be minted before this time.
params.supplyCap: The maximum number of tokens that can be minted. 0 indicates unlimited supply.

mint(address,uint256,address,uint256,byt.notice: Mint tokens.Sale must be active for all tokens.
